EmailTemplate.subject: URGENT: Your Passenger Information Form is due today!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
.
Dear {!Order_Communication_POE__c.ordexp_Purchaser_First_Name__c},
This is a final reminder that your Passenger Information Form is due.
This form is required to be completed and sent to us in order to retain your order. Please urgently click the link below to complete the attached Passenger Information Form.
Click the button below to be directed to your Passenger Information Form.
GO TO MY DEALS
If you have not already set a password, you can do so here.
Please note: If we don't receive your completed form within the next 12 hours, your booking will be cancelled. You will be issued with a TripADeal credit voucher for the value of your purchase as per the booking terms. Please refer to our Terms and Conditions for further details.
We're here to help you. If you have any questions, please visit our Support Page. Or call us on 1300 861 736.
Regards, The TripADeal Team
.
